title: Analysing Thai Media
description: This module aims to equip students with skills and strategies to read, understand and analyse articles in Thai media. By the end of this module, students will be familiarized with a wide range of advanced and authentic reading materials that are relevant to current social, economic and political developments. Further, students’ communication and presentation skills on complex topics will be developed.
prerequisite: LAT4202 Thai 6 or by placement test. Students must not have read a higher level module than this module.
